name: Arengu

screenshots.caption: Main menu with moving fog in the background.
The Inventory in the menu-area; comparison of two Items

short_description:
Arengu is a 2D Indie RPG, which is written in C# with the programming environment XNA and it's developed by three german students.
It's still in development, so you can follow the designing procress by playing this game or visiting our blog ( link to our website ).
On Twitter ( https://twitter.com/ArenguRPG ) or our blog you'll find the latest news and information.

YouTube Presentation of the latest Version ( in german ): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aPIr_-dJXQw
Blog: http://arengu.blogspot.de
Contact / Support: http://arengu.blogspot.de/p/support.html

Arengu ist ein 2D Indie RPG, entwickelt in C# mittels XNA von drei deutschen Schülern.
Das Spiel ist noch in der Entwicklung, du kannst uns beim designen des Spiels begleiten, indem du es spielst oder unseren Blog besuchst ( Link zur Homepage ).
Auf unserem Twitter-Account ( https://twitter.com/ArenguRPG ) und dem Blog findest du immer die neusten Infos.
summary: Arengu is a free 2D RPG with a thrilling story and exciting gameplay.
